mapper.select: select * from tbl_product_board order by p_num
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_board(p_num, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_main, p_serve) values(seq_p_num.nextval, #{p_name}, #{p_content}, #{p_price}, #{p_main}, #{p_serve})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product_board where p_main = #{p_main} and p_serve = #{p_serve}
select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from( select * from tbl_product_board order by p_num desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
